content: Singapore Saving Bonds (SSB) Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Nov 2018I just started working and I'm working towards putting $10k in SSB. May I know if there are any other better options to multiply my money?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 05 Nov 2018SSB gives about ~2% guaranteed returns. Over forms of investments, e.g stocks, can potentially give higher returns but they are not guaranteed. You can invest in REITS or ETFs which can provide better returns over long term.0 comments0
